mapper.update: update meeting set manager_id = #{manager.id}, title = #{title}, meeting_room_id = #{meetingRoom.id}, appointment_time = #{appointmentTime}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, is_pass = #{isPass} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, title, appointment_time,start_time, end_time, is_pass, manager_id, meeting_room_id from meeting where id = #{id}
select id, title, appointment_time, start_time, end_time, is_pass, manager_id as "manager.id", meeting_room_id as "meetingRoom.id" from meeting
select id, title, appointment_time, start_time, end_time, is_pass, manager_id , meeting_room_id from meeting where 1 = 1

select id, title, start_time, end_time , manager_id, is_pass from meeting where meeting_room_id = #{meetingRoomId} and start_time >= #{startTime} and end_time <= #{endTime}
and is_pass = #{isPass}
select id, title, start_time, end_time, is_pass from meeting where manager_id = #{userId}
select id, title, start_time, end_time , manager_id from meeting where meeting_room_id = #{meetingRoomId} and start_time >= #{startTime} and end_time <= #{endTime} and is_pass=2
select count(*) as "isPass" from meeting where start_time >= #{startTime} and end_time <= #{endTime} and is_pass = 1
